data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Cheng-Bin, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2015): Taxonomy of the genus Ptomaphaginus Portevin (Coleoptera: Leiodidae: Cholevinae: Ptomaphagini) from China, with description of eleven new species. Zootaxa 3941 (3): 301-338, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.3.1
